biography: “Rock and Roll. The kind that sticks in your brain. Loud, fast, smooth, handsome rock.” “That band is really blowing up right now. They’re number 1 on iTunes” The Rat takes inspiration from the greats - Dave Matthews Band, Counting Crows, and recent (but solid) discovery Train - and then spins it out of control. This is why Mouse Rat is Pawnee's #1 band for any music event, and all unofficial government functions. As Scarecrow Boat, the Rat refused to be confined to one style of music. Now as Mouse Rat, they continue to put out better versions of the same stuff. "It's literally mind blowing," says frontman Andy Dwyer, "Our shows are totally known to rock. And our fans (Rat Tails we call 'em) tell us they leave our shows buzzed beyond belief. They're just super jazzed, and usually tired because we play 'til no one's left." Mouse Rat is: Andy Dwyer (Chris Pratt) - Vocals, Guitar, Songwriting, Spiritual Inspiration Wyatt "Burly" Burlinson - Guitar, Backing Vocals Michael Chang - Bass, Backing Vocals James Pierson - Drums April Ludgate, Manager If "Mouse Rat" doesn't ring a bell right away, you might have experienced their awesomeness under one of their previous names: Scarecrow Boat Mouse Rat Malice in Chains Punch Face Champion Flames for Flames The Andy Andy Andys Andy and the D-Bags Crackfinger Department of Homeland Obscurity Fourskin Puppy Pendulum Possum Pendulum Penis Pendulum Radwagon Jet Black Pope Muscle Confusion Just the Tip Fiveskin Threeskin Angel Snack Nothing Rhymes With Orange Everything Rhymes With Orange Nothing Rhymes with Blorange Ninja Dick Read more on Last.fm. User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License; additional terms may apply.
name: Mouse Rat
